attributes.action: Tax companies for every mile that their employees commute to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax companies for every mile that their employees commute to work.

This would encourage home and remote working and also help towards reduction in climate change.

Rural and development areas could be exempt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
